00022 t_texture::t_texture(int w, int h, int b, void *pixels, bool _mipmapped)
00023 {
00024     glGenTextures(1, &glname);
00025     bind();
00026     mipmapped= _mipmapped;
00027     pixelcache= 0;
00028     if(pixels) setpixels(w, h, b, pixels);
00029     else { u8 *buf= new u8[w*h*(b>>3)]; setpixels(w, h, b, buf); delete[] buf; }
00030     t_pgrid::getinstance()->screen.registertexture(this);
00031 }
00032 
00033 t_texture::~t_texture()
00034 {
00035     glDeleteTextures(1, &glname);
00036     delete[] pixelcache;
00037     t_pgrid::getinstance()->screen.unregistertexture(this);
00038 }
